plugins.name: oktodigital-brand-voice
plugins.description: Generate and modify content aligned with okto-digital's brand voice (Reliable, Genuine, Curious) across all channels and formats. Includes 15-dimension voice framework, 9 specialized skills, website content workflow, and anti-boring content principles.

plugins.name: webtools-init
plugins.description: Project initialization, health checks, and registry management for the webtools website creation pipeline. Commands: /webtools-init, /webtools-health, /webtools-rebuild, /webtools-status.

plugins.name: webtools-intake
plugins.description: Client intake and project brief creation. Generate tailored questionnaires (/questionnaire) and produce structured project briefs through conversational collaboration (brief-generator agent). Produces D11 and D1.

plugins.name: webtools-brand
plugins.description: Brand voice profiling. Extract voice patterns from existing content or co-create new brand voice through iterative exploration. Produces D2: Brand Voice Profile.

plugins.name: webtools-seo
plugins.description: SEO keyword research. Produce keyword clusters with page mapping, intent classification, and priority ranking. Produces D3: SEO Keyword Map.

plugins.name: webtools-competitors
plugins.description: Competitor and reference site analysis. Crawl competitor sites and produce structural and content intelligence with cross-site pattern analysis. Produces D5: Competitor Analysis.

plugins.name: webtools-inventory
plugins.description: Content inventory and migration analysis. Crawl existing client sites, catalog content with quality assessments, and produce migration recommendations. Produces D6: Content Inventory.

plugins.name: webtools-architecture
plugins.description: Site architecture planning. Make strategic decisions about site structure, navigation, URL slugs, and user flows through conversational collaboration. Produces D4: Site Architecture.

plugins.name: webtools-blueprint
plugins.description: Page blueprint generation. Co-create page structures section by section using a Knowledge Base of proven patterns. Works one page at a time. Produces D7: Page Blueprint.

plugins.name: webtools-writer
plugins.description: Content and microcopy generation. Generate page content from blueprints following brand voice (content-generator) and produce all UI text elements (microcopy-generator). Produces D8 and D9.

plugins.name: webtools-audit
plugins.description: Content quality auditing. Evaluate generated content against SEO targets, readability standards, brand voice consistency, and heading structure. Produces D10: Content Audit Report.
